column1: Attention: Your Locale Pack doesn\'t match your Magento Version. Get more information here.
column2: Attention: Your Locale Pack doesn\'t match your Magento Version. Get more information here.

column2: Paquet de langue portugaise pt_BR - Community Edition (CE)

column1: The %s language pack in version %s has been successfully installed.
column2: Le pack de langue %s dans la version %s a été installé avec succès.

column1: On the Magento Connect page of the Portuguese language pack, you can find more information on the latest versions.
column2: Sur la Magento Connect page du pack de langue portugaise que vous trouverez de plus amples informations sur les versions actuelles.

column1: For those interested there is a GitHub repository. It is provided for the following purposes:
column2: Pour les intéressés, il est un dépôt GitHub. Il est prévu pour les fins suivantes:

column1: Development of current language pack versions
column2: Développement de versions de pack de langues actuelle

column1: Report an error / send in patches, also happy for both published releases
column2: Report an error / send in patches, also happy for both published releases

column1: Copy / forks for their own purposes
column2: Copy / forks for their own purposes

column1: Active participation in the language pack
column2: Active participation in the language pack

column1: Note for detailed information, the README file on the GitHub page.
column2: Remarque pour des informations détaillées, le fichier README sur la page GitHub.

column1: In order to ensure the translation Magento coverage, please see the information in the lower paragraphs!
column2: Afin d'assurer la couverture de la traduction Magento, s'il vous plaît voir les informations dans les paragraphes plus bas!

column1: To install the translation for the Magento Connect Manager, proceed as follows:
column2: To install the translation for the Magento Connect Manager, proceed as follows:

column1: In your Magento root directory in the subfolder "%s" rename the folder "%s" into "%s".
column2: In your Magento root directory in the subfolder "%s" rename the folder "%s" into "%s".

column1: The Magento Connect Manager should be changed to Portuguese now.
column2: La Magento Connect Manager doit maintenant être changé en portugaise.

column1: If Magento is updated, in particular the module "Mage_Downloader", the settings of the Connect Manager will be overwritten!
column2: If Magento is updated, in particular the module "Mage_Downloader", the settings of the Connect Manager will be overwritten!

column1: The same applies to the TinyMCE editor. Run in the case a "Reinstall" the language pack and repeat the described steps.
column2: The same applies to the TinyMCE editor. Run in the case a "Reinstall" the language pack and repeat the described steps.

column1: The installed language pack only provides translations of in Magento existing texts. If you want to prepare your Magento store on the legal requirements in %s or expand common payment methods, we recommend to install the following additional extensions.
column2: Le pack de langue installée seulement fournit des traductions de textes existants dans Magento. Si vous voulez préparer votre boutique Magento sur les exigences juridiques en %s ou développer des modes de paiement, nous vous recommandons d'installer les extensions suivantes.
les magasins portugaises et d'Amérique latine

column1: Use Portuguese language for TinyMCE Editor?
column2: Use Portuguese language for TinyMCE Editor?
